macro.name: TEMP_1
macro.description: Card identifier for Temperature 1 (e.g. MB1). Blank for no controller.

macro.name: TEMP_2
macro.description: Card identifier for Temperature 2 (e.g. MB1). Blank for no controller.

macro.name: TEMP_3
macro.description: Card identifier for Temperature 3 (e.g. MB1). Blank for no controller.

macro.name: TEMP_4
macro.description: Card identifier for Temperature 4 (e.g. MB1). Blank for no controller.

macro.name: LEVEL_1
macro.description: Card identifier for Level 1 (e.g. DB1). Blank for no controller.

macro.name: LEVEL_2
macro.description: Card identifier for Level 2 (e.g. DB1). Blank for no controller.

macro.name: PRESSURE_1
macro.description: Card identifier for Pressure 1 (e.g. DB1). Blank for no controller.

macro.name: PRESSURE_2
macro.description: Card identifier for Pressure 2 (e.g. DB1). Blank for no controller.
